title: Karen's First Day
description: Raising kids is tough. Keeping them alive as the zombie apocalypse begins is tougher. But that's exactly what stay-at-home mom Karen needs to do: fight fiercely to keep her young daughters safe as her husband Jim battles his way across the city, so they can escape the carnage together. On the worst day of her life, Karen finds that she will do anything to protect her family, and that the line between life and death has teeth.  For a Sneak Peek of Joseph Zuko's new novel Sweet Home keep reading at the end. Check out the next level of horror in the Zuko Catalog.  tags: zombie, zombie books, zombie book, zombie novel, zombie apocalypse, Female lead,
author: Joseph Zuko
